channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole jct New Dawn Place, 1st August
item.description:
As above

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Newdawn Place, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Road breaking up and deep pothole / slit developing, 1st August
item.description:
The location is the Cleeve Common Road just before the entrance gate to the actual pylons. The road has been breaking up here fro some while and now has developed into quite a deep pothole / subsidence - the camera not doing the damage justice. Please can this be repaired.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Location is the Cotswod Way / Aggs Hill - on a stretch nicknamed Pothole Alley, 1st August
item.description:
Potholes through this stretch have opened up again - some not filled in having been reported previously. Vehicles in both directions are going all over the road to try and avoid hitting the potholes. Thsi is quite a busy road so please can the whole stretch be checked and potholes filled in before real damage is done to vehicles
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Location - Aggs Hill Just past the entrance to the Farm and on a Blind Bend, 1st August
item.description:
The location is on the right hand side on Aggs Hill. Vehicles coming down the hill are moving to the right to avoid this pothole and hence entering a right hand blind bend on the wrong side of the road. Please can it be repaired.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aggs Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
